column20: Charged Attack: Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.
column21: Plunging Attack: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
column199: Press: #Nothing to worry about. Should anyone raise a hand against her or her men, she will avenge it ten-fold with sword and thunder.
column200: Hold: Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing Electro DMG.
column233: Skill DMG Bonus on Hit Taken
column362: Retribution: Counterattacking with Tidecaller at the precise moment when the character is hit grants the maximum DMG Bonus.
column363: Lightning Storm: Gain the following effects for 10s after unleashing Tidecaller with its maximum DMG Bonus:  • DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. ATK SPD of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. • Greatly reduced delay before unleashing Charged Attacks.
column364: Sea Beast's Scourge: When Stormbreaker is used: Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s. This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.
column365: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.
column366: Summoner of Storm: Increases the Level of Tidecaller by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column367: Stunning Revenge: Upon being attacked, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain an additional instance of 20% Electro DMG for 10s.
column368: Crimson Tidewalker: Increases the Level of Stormbreaker by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column369: Bane of Evil: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.
